references.reason: This paper is foundational for the application of differential privacy to deep learning, providing a key algorithmic basis for the current work.

references.paper_title: Calibrating Noise to Sensitivity in Private Data Analysis
references.reason: This is a seminal paper in differential privacy, introducing the core concepts and theoretical framework that underpins much of the field, including the current work.

references.paper_title: Differential privacy for functions and functional data
references.reason: This paper introduces the functional mechanism for differential privacy, a crucial component of the proposed DPConvCNP model.
This paper introduces conditional neural processes, which are the basis for the convolutional conditional neural processes (ConvCNP) used in the current work.

This paper extends the neural process framework to incorporate convolutional layers, improving performance and providing a more suitable architecture for regression tasks, forming the basis for the ConvCNP used in this work.
